text: Fluxbuntu was a Linux distribution made for computers that have less powerful hardware. It is based or made from Ubuntu and uses Fluxbox for its Window Manager. Image:Fluxbuntu-7.10-BootLoader.png|Fluxbuntu Login Window Image:Fluxbuntu-7.10 using Abiword.png|Fluxbuntu using Abiword ==Related pages== * Ubuntu * LiveDistro == Other websites == *Official website *Fluxbuntu page on Launchpad Category:Linux distributions Category:Live CD
title: Fluxbuntu
